extension.summary: Switch between different Kodi build configurations
extension.description: This addon allows you to switch between different Kodi data directories (builds) stored on your Android device. It modifies the xbmc_env.properties file to point to your selected build and restarts Kodi.
extension.disclaimer: Use at your own risk. Make sure you have backups of your Kodi configurations.
extension.news: v1.0.0 (2025-10-08) - Initial release - Scan for Kodi directories in /sdcard/ - Switch between builds - Automatically quit Kodi after switching
